name: AKV
title: Due date for filing Return of Income in ITR-7
content: The due date for filing Return of Income in ITR-7 for A.Y. 2023–24 has been extended by CBDT from October 31st to November 30th, 2023. Refer CBDT Circular No. 16/2023 dated September 18th, 2023.

name: AKV
title: Due date for filing Audit Reports in Form 10B/Form 10BB
content: The due date for filing Audit Reports in Form 10B/Form 10BB for A.Y. 2023–24 has been extended by CBDT from September 30th to October 31st, 2023. Refer CBDT Circular No. 16/2023 dated September 18th, 2023.

name: AKV
title: Notice Inviting Tender
content: Notice Inviting Tender (NIT) for Request For Proposals (RFP) for Selection of Managed Service Provider (MSP) for ITBA 2.0 Project.
